prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Minutes of House Meetings of the Sigma Chi Dormitory (AZ 327). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: During World War II, Sigma Chi fraternity, having no active membership, leased its house to The University of Arizona as a residence hall for undergraduate women students.
